info.name: ZiraAI - Sponsor Analytics (Complete)
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for all Sponsor Analytics endpoints with multiple scenarios, test scripts, and examples.

## Features
- 4 Main Endpoints with 20+ Request Variations
- Pre-request Scripts for Token Management
- Automated Test Scripts
- Environment Variables
- Example Responses

## Setup
1. Import this collection
2. Set environment variables (see Variables tab)
3. Run 'Auth - Login as Sponsor' to get token
4. Token auto-refreshes before each request

## Endpoints
1. Messaging Analytics (7 variations)
2. Impact Analytics (3 variations)
3. Temporal Analytics (6 variations)
4. ROI Analytics (4 variations)

## Version: 1.0
## Last Updated: 2025-01-25

item.name: 0. Authentication

exec: // Calculate token expiry (60 minutes from now)

request.description:
Login as sponsor user to get JWT token. Token is automatically saved to environment variables.

**Required Environment Variables:**
- `sponsor_email`: Sponsor account email
- `sponsor_password`: Sponsor account password

**Sets Environment Variables:**
- `sponsor_token`: JWT access token
- `sponsor_refresh_token`: Refresh token
- `sponsor_user_id`: User ID
- `token_expiry`: Token expiration timestamp
Login as admin user for testing admin access to sponsor analytics.
Refresh expired token using refresh token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for obtaining and refreshing JWT tokens.

item.name: 1. Messaging Analytics

exec: console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Token expired or missing - please run Login request first');

request.description:
Get all-time messaging analytics without date filters.

**Returns:**
- Message volumes (sent, received, unread)
- Response metrics (avg time, rate)
- Conversation metrics (total, active)
- Content types (text, voice, attachments)
- Satisfaction metrics (avg rating, positive count)
- Top 10 most active conversations

**Cache:** 15 minutes

exec: console.log('üìÖ Date Range: ' + startDate.toISOString() + ' to ' + endDate.toISOString());

**Use Case:** Weekly performance review

Get messaging analytics for the last 30 days.

**Use Case:** Monthly performance review

Get messaging analytics for current month (month-to-date).

**Use Case:** Current month dashboard

Get messaging analytics for a custom date range.

**Use Case:** Specific period analysis (e.g., campaign period)

**Note:** Modify dates as needed

item.description:
Messaging analytics endpoints with multiple scenarios:
- All-time analytics
- Last 7/30 days
- Current month
- Custom date range
- Negative tests (unauthorized, invalid dates)

item.name: 2. Impact Analytics

request.description:
Get comprehensive agricultural and geographic impact analytics.

**Returns:**
- Farmer Impact: reach, retention, lifetime
- Agricultural Impact: crops, diseases, critical issues
- Geographic Reach: cities, districts, top locations
- Distribution: severity, crop types, disease types
- Impact Summary: Turkish narrative

**Cache:** 6 hours

**Use Case:** Daily/weekly impact dashboard

**Authorization Test:** Admin user accessing sponsor analytics.

**Expected:** 200 OK (Admin has access)

**Note:** Uses admin_token instead of sponsor_token

exec: console.log('   Run this request again within 6 hours to test cache hit');

request.description:
**Cache Test:** Run this request twice to verify caching.

**First Request:**
- Cache miss (from database)
- Slower response time
- Saves response time and data

**Second Request:**
- Cache hit
- Faster response time
- Same data

**Cache TTL:** 6 hours

item.description:
Impact analytics endpoint covering:
- Agricultural impact metrics
- Geographic reach
- Farmer retention
- Cache behavior testing
- Admin access testing

item.name: 3. Temporal Analytics

request.description:
Get daily time-series data for last 30 days.

**Returns:**
- Daily data points (codes, analyses, farmers, messages)
- Trend analysis (growth percentages)
- Peak performance days

**Use Case:** Line chart for 30-day dashboard

Get weekly time-series data for last 3 months.

**Use Case:** Weekly reports, mid-term trends

Get monthly time-series data for last 12 months.

**Use Case:** Annual reports, year-over-year analysis

Get temporal analytics with default parameters.

**Defaults:**
- startDate: 90 days ago
- endDate: now
- groupBy: Day

Get daily trends for current month (month-to-date).

**Use Case:** Current month performance tracking

exec: pm.test('Returns 400 Bad Request for invalid groupBy', () => {

request.description:
**Negative Test:** Invalid groupBy parameter.

**Expected:** 400 Bad Request with error message

**Valid values:** Day, Week, Month

item.description:
Temporal analytics with dynamic grouping:
- Daily trends (best for 30-90 days)
- Weekly trends (best for 3-6 months)
- Monthly trends (best for 12+ months)
- Default behavior
- Invalid parameter testing

item.name: 4. ROI Analytics

exec: console.log('    -', tier.tierName + ':', tier.roi + '% ROI,', tier.utilizationRate + '% utilization');

request.description:
Get comprehensive ROI and financial analytics.

**Returns:**
- Cost Breakdown (per code, analysis, farmer)
- Value Analysis (total value, lifetime value)
- ROI Metrics (overall ROI, tier-based ROI)
- Efficiency Metrics (utilization, waste, breakeven)

**Cache:** 12 hours

**Use Case:** Financial dashboard, investment tracking

**Validation Test:** Verify ROI calculation logic.

**Tests:**
- Manual ROI calculation vs API result
- Breakeven calculation verification
- Formula validation

**Formulas:**
- ROI = ((Total Value - Investment) / Investment) √ó 100
- Breakeven = Investment √∑ AnalysisUnitValue
- Total Value = Analyses Count √ó 50 TL

exec: var sortedTiers = data.roiByTier.sort((a, b) => b.roi - a.roi);
console.log('   Codes:', tier.codesRedeemed + '/' + tier.codesPurchased, '(' + tier.utilizationRate + '% utilization)');
console.log('üèÜ Best Tier:', bestTier.tierName, 'with', bestTier.roi + '% ROI');
console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Worst Tier:', worstTier.tierName, 'with', worstTier.roi + '% ROI');

request.description:
**Data Extraction:** Focus on tier-based performance.

**Extracts:**
- ROI per tier (S, M, L, XL)
- Utilization rates per tier
- Best/worst performing tier
- Investment vs value per tier

**Saves to Environment:**
- `tier_performance`: JSON with all tier data

exec: console.log('   Run again within 12 hours to test cache hit');
var cacheAge = (new Date() - new Date(cacheTime)) / 1000 / 60; // minutes

request.description:
**Cache Test:** Verify 12-hour cache behavior.

**First Request:**
- Cache miss
- Slower response
- Saves timestamp

**Second Request (within 12 hours):**
- Cache hit
- Faster response
- Shows cache age

**After 12 hours:**
- Cache expired
- New cache miss

item.description:
ROI analytics covering:
- Financial metrics (cost, value, ROI)
- Tier-based performance comparison
- Calculation verification
- Breakeven tracking
- Long cache behavior (12 hours)

Dashboard scenario combining multiple analytics.

**To test parallel execution:**
1. Right-click "Run All Analytics" folder
2. Select "Run folder"
3. Enable parallel execution
4. Compare total time

item.name: 6. Run All Analytics (Sequential)
item.description:
Run all 4 analytics endpoints sequentially.

**Use Case:** Full dashboard data fetch

**To Run:**
1. Right-click this folder
2. Select "Run folder"
3. Review summary in runner
